name: TheInteract
tag_list: social, networking, conversation, brainstorming, debate, webcam
overview:
TheInteract is a portal to face-to-face interaction with anyone in the world.

It is a global meeting place for idea sharing, debate, and connecting with others. TheInteract widens your web by bumping you out of your bubble.

Face-to-face conversation is the way our brains are hardwired to communicate, it is a powerful tool for connecting, sharing, and engaging with others. TheInteract hosts conversations where people come together to engage with big moral questions, explore cultural differences, or innovate through collaboration. Users can join one of the rooms TheInteract has created, join a public room created by someone else, or create their own room for their community.

Think of it as a global university, water cooler, or cafÃ©. One engaging conversation follows another as you walk around and mingle with others.
